title: Where can I find the Google Recorder App for my Pixel 2 in the Play Store?
content:
Hi!

I have been able to find the Google Recorder app in the Play Store for my Pixel 2 running Android 11. The supposed link for the recorder app in the Netherlands gives the error: "Requested URL not found on the server".

Installing APK files does not work either.

Cheers!

Matthijs
